email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well.

We have a vessel available for your steel coils shipment from Busan to Los Angeles. The vessel is MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m. The indicative freight rate is USD 65/MT, FOB terms.

Laycan is 15-20 October 2023. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you adjust it to USD 60/MT? Also, could you provide the vessel's demurrage rate and confirm the cargo size is 12,000MT?

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Cargo Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for your response. I can adjust the rate to USD 62/MT, which is the best I can offer at the moment. The cargo size is confirmed at 12,000MT, and the demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 62/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the recap.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Great! Here’s the recap:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000MT
Load Port: Busan
Discharge Port: Los Angeles
Incoterms: FOB
Vessel: MV OCEAN HORIZON
Freight: USD 62/MT
Laycan: 15-20 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

Please confirm receipt.

Best regards,
Lucas
